Text:
But ,You can get key for Windows 8 Pro with Media Center and activate Windows 8 with WMC ,for FREE!

http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-8/feature-packs

Kizo, thanks so much for this upload! :)

For the rest of you: Kizo's link (above) is to an UPGRADE from Win 8 to Win 8 PRO and it's NOT free now anymore. It's $69.99 USD.  (2012-12-11)

Charlie, You can get Windows 8 Media Center Pack key for free, until 31. 01. 2013.

The only catch is - You can only get five keys per email.

Quote: ''Offer valid from October 26, 2012, until January 31, 2013, and is limited to five licenses per customer per promotion.''
